document.full_text: u.s. secretary of state hillary clinton visits egypt on tuesday to urge its military rulers to lay the ground for a genuine transition to democracy and offer support to the citizens that toppled hosni mubarak from power.
document.title: clinton to tell egyptians democracy takes time
lines_and_colors: u.s. secretary of state hillary clinton visits egypt on tuesday to urge its military rulers to lay the ground for a genuine transition to democracy and offer support to the citizens that toppled hosni mubarak from power.
